View this short National Theatre clip about the technique of transfer from drawing called ‘pouncing’:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2v_QTfd8ZIk

title.value: ‘The Whitehall Mural’ - Power and authority in Tudor royal portraits

summary.value: To explore the symbolism and significance of the mural as a work of propaganda and as a reflection of Henry VIII’s religious, political and personal outlook.

brief.value: To explore the symbolism and significance of the mural as a work of propaganda and as a reflection of Henry VIII’s religious, political and personal outlook.
